text: Nde harigi guma the han bigɨn the ŋgarɨgar muuŋgip, nde fhura mba ŋgarɨga ganɨrim, ana nden kɨ thari. Nde kha ŋgarɨgara, ana zazera nden kɨri. Mba ŋgarɨk khare, nde won ndavira harigi gumgi gu mbigir nɨɨŋri. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, guma, ana won ndavar harigi gumgi ga ndɨɨi, ana guigira Fhe Bakɨme Moses ga nɨɨŋgi tɨva zɨn vui.
